item.title: Hello World
item.description: 你好世界 Hello World C #include <stdio.h> int main() { printf("Hello, World! \n"); return 0; } C# using System; namespace HelloWorldApplication { class HelloWorld { static void Main(string[] args) { Console.WriteLine("Hello World"); Console.ReadKey(); } } } JAVA public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello World"); } } JavaScript function helloWorld () { alert("Hello, World!") } Python #!/usr/bin/python3 print("Hello, World!")
